org.netbeans.modules.bugtracking.spi

Interface IssuePriorityProvider<I>

  • Type Parameters:
    I - the implementation specific issue type

    public interface IssuePriorityProvider<I>
    Provides Issue Priority information for a particular remote repository as well as for a particular Issue from that repository.

    Note that an implementation of this interface is not mandatory for a NetBeans bugtracking plugin.

    Since:
    1.85

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getPriorityID(I i)
      Determines the Priority of an Issue, where the returned id is expected to match with exactly one IssuePriorityInfo.getID() which was returned via getPriorityInfos().
      IssuePriorityInfo[] getPriorityInfos()
      Provides information about Issue Priorities given by a remote server.

    • Method Detail

      • getPriorityID

        String getPriorityID(I i)
        Determines the Priority of an Issue, where the returned id is expected to match with exactly one IssuePriorityInfo.getID() which was returned via getPriorityInfos().
        Parameters:
        i - an implementation specific issue instance
        Returns:
        the priority ID
        Since:
        1.85
        See Also:
        IssuePriorityInfo

      • getPriorityInfos

        IssuePriorityInfo[] getPriorityInfos()
        Provides information about Issue Priorities given by a remote server. The order in the returned array also determines the rank of a particular priority, where the PriorityInfo with the lowest index stands for the highest Priority and so on.

        For example a default Bugzilla setup would return an array of five PriorityInfo-s, where the first would be P1, the second P2, etc.

        Returns:
        priority infos
        Since:
        1.85
        See Also:
        IssuePriorityInfo
